link: Re download this resource on your keymaster
msg:
# Add
	- Added 'Press E'
	- Customizable textUI
	- Display of markers and text for specific zones in the game based on player proximity and requirements. It provides real-time visual information and interaction to the player
	- Securing triggers to prevent cheating
	- Replaced the TranslateCap function with the locale of Overextended
	- Fully customizable notifications
